Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory65.jpg'}
{3: 'The monster is powerful, even summoning countless bionics to fight for it.'}
{3: 'But up against the battle-hardened Constructs of "Virtual Horizon"...'}
{2: "Entropy, don't let any stragglers go!", 3: '6'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Entropy', 3: "I'd advise giving up.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The bionics charging on the frontline are reduced to scrap metal amid the bulletstorm, hindering their assault.'}
{2: 'Eclipse, stop them in their tracks.', 3: '11'}
{3: 'Right as the bionics slow their assault, Eclipse opens up a small black hole, absorbing a horde of bionics and clearing a much needed path.'}
{2: "Lotus... It's all up to you.", 3: '16'}
{3: 'Lotus jumps on the back of a bionic, leaping into battle and charging the monster.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dark Monster', 3: 'AAAAGGHHH!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The monster adeptly swings its claws to catch Lotus, but it takes two scythed hits from both sides.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Brilliance', 3: "Be careful, don't let me take everyone's attention away!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Arclight', 3: 'Give it your best shot!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Without skipping a beat, Lotus stomps on the monster's claws and plunges her blade into its chest."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'The dying monster waves its claws wildly, clearing all of the Constructs in its way. It fixes its gaze, in preparation to charge at you.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: 'Commandant, watch out!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Storm leaps high and cleaves the monster in two with her chainsaw, leaving everyone stunned.'}
{2: 'When did the Storm model get so OP?!', 3: '42'}
{3: 'Regardless, the monster is finally vanquished. The world around you begins to fade into a blur.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ann', 3: "It's over... Commandant... You will soon return to your world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "I'm afraid you'll forget all of this when you wake up, since your consciousness was forced in here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You mean like it was all a dream?', 3: '49'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: 'A dream... Perhaps. Maybe it will be for you, and maybe even to us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ann', 3: "Looks like it's time for us to sleep as well. Maybe we'll meet again next time when we wake upâ€”Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Is the commandant awake?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Yes. Just dozed off is all. Looks like everything is back to normal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'What about "Virtual Horizon"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Rosetta and I checked again, and no abnormalities were found. That strange data noise hasn't appeared ever since.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'So, looks you guys were worried about nothing.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Maybe, but according to the commandant, the sudden slumber came right after the experiment, which is not normal.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I highly advise putting a stop to further testing until we uncover the truth behind the matter.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Alright, sure.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As Asimov leaves, Nikola lets out a grin.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Maybe it was too urgent this time, but... there will surely be more opportunities.', 4: '1'}
